channel.title: Anonymous Functions :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: You already know one method for creating a function : function myFunction(parameter1, parameter2,..., parameterN) { // function body }A function defined in this way is a named function (myFunction, in the example above). Many programming languages, including JavaScript, allow us to create anonymous functions, which do not have names. We can create an anonymous function by simply leaving off the function name when defining it:
